Yun

by Mojon Twins

Released Jun 1, 2018
Players 1
Tags platformer
License LGPLv3

Download ROM (sha-1: f016bf14732bbed06d9bbc7854e5d8fb1ee301fa)

Play now

Description

The main goal is helping yun capturing every single being to fill the pantry of her restaurant. To capture her enemies, Yun must stun them by means of hitting them with a bubble. Once they are stunned, they can be captured just touching them. [v5]
